messages.title: BREXIT DEAL AGREED AND READY TO GO
messages.content: Protects jobs and trade, ends uncertainty for our economy, ready to go from day one of a new parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: New Brexit deal agreed with EU that protects jobs and trade and ends uncertainty for our economy.
An extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS, 20,000 extra police officers, making more funding available for schools across Wales
An immigration system that works for Britain
CORBYN - FIVE LONG YEARS OF GRIDLOCK, five potential years of delay and far-left policies, pact with Nicola Sturgeon

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Nicola Sturgeon, Jo Swinson
mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a handful of seats will decide the election. The constituency results are close in Aberconwy.

issues.brexitEurope: Deal agreed with EU that protects jobs and trade, ends uncertainty for our economy, ready to go from day one of a new parliament.
issues.economy: Invest more in country's priorities, higher national living wage
issues.health: An extra £1.2 billion for our Welsh NHS, 20,000 extra police officers
issues.immigration: An immigration system that works for Britain
issues.governance: CORBYN - FIVE LONG YEARS OF GRIDLOCK, five potential years of delay and far-left policies, a pact with Nicola Sturgeon

quotes.text: Let's not go back to square one with Corbyn
